blocks.name: crrv
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the class of real-valued random variables.

blocks.name: df-rrv
blocks.content: In its generic definition, a random variable is a measurable function from a probability space to a Borel set. Here, we specifically target real-valued random variables, i.e. measurable function from a probability space to the Borel sigma-algebra on the set of real numbers. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 20-Sep-2016.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Jan-2017.)

blocks.name: rrvmbfm
blocks.content: A real-valued random variable is a measurable function from its sample space to the Borel sigma-algebra. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm rrvmbfm(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cfv(crrv, c1)), wcel(c0, co(cdm(c1), cmbfm, cbrsiga))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cprb))
} = {
  eleq2d(c0, cfv(crrv, c1), co(cdm(c1), cmbfm, cbrsiga), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(crrv, c1), co(cdm(c1), cmbfm, cbrsiga)), wcel(c1, cprb))
  fvmpt(hs0, c1, cprb, crrv, co(cdm(c1), cmbfm, cbrsiga), co(cdm(cv(hs0)), cmbfm, cbrsiga))
  oveq1d(cdm(cv(hs0)), cmbfm, cbrsiga, cdm(c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  dmeq(cv(hs0), c1)
  df-rrv(hs0)
  ovex(cdm(c1), cmbfm, cbrsiga)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cprb)
  diff.hs0.c(co(cdm(c1), cmbfm, cbrsiga))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rrvmbfm(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àà(rRndVar ` c1)‚Üî c0 ‚àà(dom(c1)[MblFnM]BrSiga)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà Prob)
} = {
  eleq2d(c0, (rRndVar ` c1), (dom(c1)[MblFnM]BrSiga), w0)
  syl(w0, (rRndVar ` c1)=(dom(c1)[MblFnM]BrSiga), c1 ‚àà Prob)
  fvmpt(hs0, c1, cprb, crrv, (dom(c1)[MblFnM]BrSiga), (dom(hs0)[MblFnM]BrSiga))
  oveq1d(dom(hs0), cmbfm, cbrsiga, dom(c1), hs0 = c1)
  dmeq(hs0, c1)
  df-rrv(hs0)
  ovex(dom(c1), cmbfm, cbrsiga)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cprb)
  diff.hs0.c((dom(c1)[MblFnM]BrSiga))
}

blocks.name: isrrvv
blocks.content: Elementhood to the set of real-valued random variables with respect to the probability ` P ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm isrrvv(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cfv(crrv, c1)), wa(wf(c0, cuni(cdm(c1)), cr), wral(s0, cbrsiga, wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(s0)), cdm(c1))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cprb))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  3bitrd(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(crrv, c1)), wa(wf(c0, cuni(cdm(c1)), cr), wral(s0, cbrsiga, wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(s0)), cdm(c1)))), wcel(c0, co(cdm(c1), cmbfm, cbrsiga)), wa(wcel(c0, co(cuni(cbrsiga), cmap, cuni(cdm(c1)))), wral(s0, cbrsiga, wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(s0)), cdm(c1)))))
  rrvmbfm(c0, c1, w0)
  ismbfm(s0, c0, cdm(c1), cbrsiga, w0)
  mp1i(w0, wcel(cbrsiga, cuni(crn(csiga))), wcel(cbrsiga, cfv(csiga, cr)))
  brsigarn()
  elrnsiga(cbrsiga, cr)
  anbi1d(w0, wcel(c0, co(cuni(cbrsiga), cmap, cuni(cdm(c1)))), wral(s0, cbrsiga, wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(s0)), cdm(c1))), wf(c0, cuni(cdm(c1)), cr))
  syl5bb(w0, wcel(c0, co(cuni(cbrsiga), cmap, cuni(cdm(c1)))), wf(c0, cuni(cdm(c1)), cr), wcel(c0, co(cr, cmap, cuni(cdm(c1)))))
  eleq2i(c0, co(cuni(cbrsiga), cmap, cuni(cdm(c1))), co(cr, cmap, cuni(cdm(c1))))
  oveq1i(cuni(cbrsiga), cmap, cuni(cdm(c1)), cr)
  unibrsiga()
  sylancr(w0, wb(wcel(c0, co(cr, cmap, cuni(cdm(c1)))), wf(c0, cuni(cdm(c1)), cr)), wcel(cr, universe), wcel(cuni(cdm(c1)), universe))
  reex()
  syl(w0, wcel(cuni(cdm(c1)), universe), wcel(cdm(c1), cuni(crn(csiga))))
  syl(w0, wcel(cdm(c1), cuni(crn(csiga))), wcel(c1, cprb))
  domprobsiga(c1)
  uniexg(cdm(c1), cuni(crn(csiga)))
  elmapg(cr, universe, cuni(cdm(c1)), universe, c0)
  diff.cdm.s(s0, c1)
  diff.cbrsiga.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isrrvv(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àà(rRndVar ` c1)‚Üî((c0 : ‚ãÉ dom(c1)‚Üí ‚Ñù)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà BrSiga,(`' c0 " s0)‚àà dom(c1)))))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà Prob)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  3bitrd(w0, c0 ‚àà(rRndVar ` c1), ((c0 : ‚ãÉ dom(c1)‚Üí ‚Ñù)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà BrSiga,(`' c0 " s0)‚àà dom(c1))), c0 ‚àà(dom(c1)[MblFnM]BrSiga), (c0 ‚àà(‚ãÉ BrSiga[‚Ü¶]‚ãÉ dom(c1))‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà BrSiga,(`' c0 " s0)‚àà dom(c1))))
  rrvmbfm(c0, c1, w0)
  ismbfm(s0, c0, dom(c1), cbrsiga, w0)
  mp1i(w0, BrSiga ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(sigAlgebra), BrSiga ‚àà(sigAlgebra ` ‚Ñù))
  brsigarn()
  elrnsiga(cbrsiga, cr)
  anbi1d(w0, c0 ‚àà(‚ãÉ BrSiga[‚Ü¶]‚ãÉ dom(c1)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà BrSiga,(`' c0 " s0)‚àà dom(c1)), (c0 : ‚ãÉ dom(c1)‚Üí ‚Ñù))
  syl5bb(w0, c0 ‚àà(‚ãÉ BrSiga[‚Ü¶]‚ãÉ dom(c1)), (c0 : ‚ãÉ dom(c1)‚Üí ‚Ñù), c0 ‚àà(‚Ñù[‚Ü¶]‚ãÉ dom(c1)))
  eleq2i(c0, (‚ãÉ BrSiga[‚Ü¶]‚ãÉ dom(c1)), (‚Ñù[‚Ü¶]‚ãÉ dom(c1)))
  oveq1i(‚ãÉ BrSiga, cmap, ‚ãÉ dom(c1), cr)
  unibrsiga()
  sylancr(w0, (c0 ‚àà(‚Ñù[‚Ü¶]‚ãÉ dom(c1))‚Üî(c0 : ‚ãÉ dom(c1)‚Üí ‚Ñù)), ‚Ñù ‚àà ùïå, ‚ãÉ dom(c1)‚àà ùïå)
  reex()
  syl(w0, ‚ãÉ dom(c1)‚àà ùïå, dom(c1)‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(sigAlgebra))
  syl(w0, dom(c1)‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(sigAlgebra), c1 ‚àà Prob)
  domprobsiga(c1)
  uniexg(dom(c1), ‚ãÉ ran(sigAlgebra))
  elmapg(cr, universe, ‚ãÉ dom(c1), universe, c0)
  diff.cdm.s(s0, c1)
  diff.cbrsiga.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: rrvvf
blocks.content: A real-valued random variable is a function. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Jan-2017.)

blocks.name: rrvfn
blocks.content: A real-valued random variable is a function over the universe. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Jan-2017.)

blocks.name: rrvdm
blocks.content: The domain of a random variable is the universe. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Jan-2017.)

blocks.name: rrvrnss
blocks.content: The range of a random variable as a subset of ` RR ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 6-Feb-2017.)

blocks.name: rrvf2
blocks.content: A real-valued random variable is a function. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Jan-2017.)

blocks.name: rrvdmss
blocks.content: The domain of a random variable. This is useful to shorten proofs. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Jan-2017.)

blocks.name: rrvfinvima
blocks.content: For a real-value random variable ` X ` , any open interval in ` RR ` is the image of a measurable set. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Jan-2017.)

blocks.name: 0rrv
blocks.content: The constant function equal to zero is a random variable. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Jan-2017.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:

  xpeq2(cin(csn(nat0), cv(hs0)), emptycls, cuni(cdm(c0)))

  3syl(w0, wcel(emptycls, cdm(c0)), wcel(c0, cprb), wcel(cdm(c0), cuni(crn(csiga))))
  domprobsiga(c0)
  0elsiga(cdm(c0))
  syl5eqel(cima(ccnv(cmpt(s0, cuni(cdm(c0)), nat0)), cv(hs0)), cdm(c0), cdm(cxp(cuni(cdm(c0)), cin(csn(nat0), cv(hs0)))), wa(w0, wne(cin(csn(nat0), cv(hs0)), emptycls)))
  3eqtri(cima(ccnv(cmpt(s0, cuni(cdm(c0)), nat0)), cv(hs0)), cdm(cxp(cuni(cdm(c0)), cin(csn(nat0), cv(hs0)))), cdm(ccnv(cres(cxp(csn(nat0), cuni(cdm(c0))), cv(hs0)))), cdm(ccnv(cxp(cin(csn(nat0), cv(hs0)), cuni(cdm(c0))))))
  3eqtri(cima(ccnv(cmpt(s0, cuni(cdm(c0)), nat0)), cv(hs0)), cdm(ccnv(cres(cxp(csn(nat0), cuni(cdm(c0))), cv(hs0)))), cima(cxp(csn(nat0), cuni(cdm(c0))), cv(hs0)), crn(cres(cxp(csn(nat0), cuni(cdm(c0))), cv(hs0))))
  imaeq1i(ccnv(cmpt(s0, cuni(cdm(c0)), nat0)), cv(hs0), cxp(csn(nat0), cuni(cdm(c0))))

thm rrvsum(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cn)), wcel(c1, cfv(crrv, c2)))

} = {
  eqeltrd(c1, cfv(crrv, c2), cfv(cseq(nat1, cof(caddc), c3), c0), wa(w0, wcel(c0, cn)))
  impcom(w0, wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cfv(cseq(nat1, cof(caddc), c3), c0), cfv(crrv, c2)))
  nnind(hs0, hs1, c0, wi(w0, wcel(cfv(cseq(nat1, cof(caddc), c3), c0), cfv(crrv, c2))), wi(w0, wcel(cfv(cseq(nat1, cof(caddc), c3), cv(hs0)), cfv(crrv, c2))), wi(w0, wcel(cfv(cseq(nat1, cof(caddc), c3), nat1), cfv(crrv, c2))), wi(w0, wcel(cfv(cseq(nat1, cof(caddc), c3), cv(hs1)), cfv(crrv, c2))), wi(w0, wcel(cfv(cseq(nat1, cof(caddc), c3), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), cfv(crrv, c2))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), nat1), w0, wcel(cfv(cseq(nat1, cof(caddc), c3), cv(hs0)), cfv(crrv, c2)), wcel(cfv(cseq(nat1, cof(caddc), c3), nat1), cfv(crrv, c2)))
  eleq1d(cfv(cseq(nat1, cof(caddc), c3), cv(hs0)), cfv(crrv, c2), cfv(cseq(nat1, cof(caddc), c3), nat1), wceq(cv(hs0), nat1))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), nat1, cseq(nat1, cof(caddc), c3))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), w0, wcel(cfv(cseq(nat1, cof(caddc), c3), cv(hs0)), cfv(crrv, c2)), wcel(cfv(cseq(nat1, cof(caddc), c3), cv(hs1)), cfv(crrv, c2)))
  eleq1d(cfv(cseq(nat1, cof(caddc), c3), cv(hs0)), cfv(crrv, c2), cfv(cseq(nat1, cof(caddc), c3), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cseq(nat1, cof(caddc), c3))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), w0, wcel(cfv(cseq(nat1, cof(caddc), c3), cv(hs0)), cfv(crrv, c2)), wcel(cfv(cseq(nat1, cof(caddc), c3), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), cfv(crrv, c2)))
  eleq1d(cfv(cseq(nat1, cof(caddc), c3), cv(hs0)), cfv(crrv, c2), cfv(cseq(nat1, cof(caddc), c3), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), cseq(nat1, cof(caddc), c3))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), w0, wcel(cfv(cseq(nat1, cof(caddc), c3), cv(hs0)), cfv(crrv, c2)), wcel(cfv(cseq(nat1, cof(caddc), c3), c0), cfv(crrv, c2)))
  eleq1d(cfv(cseq(nat1, cof(caddc), c3), cv(hs0)), cfv(crrv, c2), cfv(cseq(nat1, cof(caddc), c3), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))

thm rrvsum(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ ((w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï)‚Üí c1 ‚àà(rRndVar ` c2))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà Prob)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c3 : ‚Ñï ‚Üí(rRndVar ` c2)))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï)‚Üí c1 =(seq(1(oF(+), c3))` c0))
} = {
  eqeltrd(c1, (rRndVar ` c2), (seq(1(oF(+), c3))` c0), (w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï))
  impcom(w0, c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï, (seq(1(oF(+), c3))` c0)‚àà(rRndVar ` c2))
  nnind(hs0, hs1, c0, (w0 ‚Üí(seq(1(oF(+), c3))` c0)‚àà(rRndVar ` c2)), (w0 ‚Üí(seq(1(oF(+), c3))` hs0)‚àà(rRndVar ` c2)), (w0 ‚Üí(seq(1(oF(+), c3))` 1)‚àà(rRndVar ` c2)), (w0 ‚Üí(seq(1(oF(+), c3))` hs1)‚àà(rRndVar ` c2)), (w0 ‚Üí(seq(1(oF(+), c3))`(hs1[+]1))‚àà(rRndVar ` c2)))
  imbi2d(hs0 = 1, w0, (seq(1(oF(+), c3))` hs0)‚àà(rRndVar ` c2), (seq(1(oF(+), c3))` 1)‚àà(rRndVar ` c2))
  eleq1d((seq(1(oF(+), c3))` hs0), (rRndVar ` c2), (seq(1(oF(+), c3))` 1), hs0 = 1)
  fveq2(hs0, nat1, seq(1(oF(+), c3)))
  imbi2d(hs0 = hs1, w0, (seq(1(oF(+), c3))` hs0)‚àà(rRndVar ` c2), (seq(1(oF(+), c3))` hs1)‚àà(rRndVar ` c2))
  eleq1d((seq(1(oF(+), c3))` hs0), (rRndVar ` c2), (seq(1(oF(+), c3))` hs1), hs0 = hs1)
  fveq2(hs0, hs1, seq(1(oF(+), c3)))
  imbi2d(hs0 =(hs1[+]1), w0, (seq(1(oF(+), c3))` hs0)‚àà(rRndVar ` c2), (seq(1(oF(+), c3))`(hs1[+]1))‚àà(rRndVar ` c2))
  eleq1d((seq(1(oF(+), c3))` hs0), (rRndVar ` c2), (seq(1(oF(+), c3))`(hs1[+]1)), hs0 =(hs1[+]1))
  fveq2(hs0, (hs1[+]1), seq(1(oF(+), c3)))
  imbi2d(hs0 = c0, w0, (seq(1(oF(+), c3))` hs0)‚àà(rRndVar ` c2), (seq(1(oF(+), c3))` c0)‚àà(rRndVar ` c2))
  eleq1d((seq(1(oF(+), c3))` hs0), (rRndVar ` c2), (seq(1(oF(+), c3))` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, seq(1(oF(+), c3)))
  syl5eqel((seq(1(oF(+), c3))` 1), (rRndVar ` c2), (c3 ` 1), w0)
  ax-mp((seq(1(oF(+), c3))` 1)=(c3 ` 1), 1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§)
  1z()
  seq1(nat1, oF(+), c3)
  mpan2(w0, (c3 ` 1)‚àà(rRndVar ` c2), 1 ‚àà ‚Ñï)
  1nn()
  ffvelrnda(nat1, cn, c3, (rRndVar ` c2), w0)
  a2d(hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñï, w0, (seq(1(oF(+), c3))` hs1)‚àà(rRndVar ` c2), (seq(1(oF(+), c3))`(hs1[+]1))‚àà(rRndVar ` c2))
  expcom(hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñï, w0, ((seq(1(oF(+), c3))` hs1)‚àà(rRndVar ` c2)‚Üí(seq(1(oF(+), c3))`(hs1[+]1))‚àà(rRndVar ` c2)))
  ex((w0 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñï), (seq(1(oF(+), c3))` hs1)‚àà(rRndVar ` c2), (seq(1(oF(+), c3))`(hs1[+]1))‚àà(rRndVar ` c2))
  eqeltrd((seq(1(oF(+), c3))`(hs1[+]1)), (rRndVar ` c2), ((seq(1(oF(+), c3))` hs1)[oF(+)](c3 `(hs1[+]1))), ((w0 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñï)‚àß(seq(1(oF(+), c3))` hs1)‚àà(rRndVar ` c2)))

  eleq2s(hs1, cn, (‚Ñ§‚â• ` 1), (seq(1(oF(+), c3))`(hs1[+]1))=((seq(1(oF(+), c3))` hs1)[oF(+)](c3 `(hs1[+]1))))

  adantr((w0 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñï), (seq(1(oF(+), c3))` hs1)‚àà(rRndVar ` c2), (c3 `(hs1[+]1))‚àà(rRndVar ` c2))
  sylan2(w0, hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñï, (c3 `(hs1[+]1))‚àà(rRndVar ` c2), (hs1[+]1)‚àà ‚Ñï)
  peano2nn(hs1)
  ffvelrnda((hs1[+]1), cn, c3, (rRndVar ` c2), w0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w((w0 ‚Üí(seq(1(oF(+), c3))` c0)‚àà(rRndVar ` c2)))

  diff.hs1.w((w0 ‚Üí(seq(1(oF(+), c3))` hs0)‚àà(rRndVar ` c2)))
